# Boa Favorites

1. Deploy our favorites contract using titanoboa
2. Interact with our contract using titanoboa
3. Deploy to the "pyevm" network
4. Deploy to anvil network
5. Set the "activate env" in boa
6. Work with accounts

# Deployment

1. PyEVM Deployment Completed
2. 
3. Anvil Deployment - Contract Address: 0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3

4. Workshop Deployment using Anvil Completed - Contract Address: 0xCf7Ed3AccA5a467e9e704C703E8D87F634fB0Fc9

5. Workshop Deployment using Tenderly Completed - Contract Address: 0x7e245E56EfD06a6BEa47502A1b186183A56cAC00
```bash
guire@Anthony:~/vyper-course/boa-favorites-cu$ python deploy_workshop_tenderly.py
```
